text: Tiffany said, "Actually, we're very fortunate when it comes to nastiness."

passages.full_quote: <used>Tiffany said, "Actually, we're very</used> proud of our sheep."

passages.full_quote: Can't think why, <used>we're very fortunate when it comes to</used> setting fire to cottages, too
In the old days the clan would kill off a yennork quickly, and Wolfgang is a traditionalist <used>when it comes to nastiness</used>
